meanings.definition: To strike forcefully with a sledgehammer.
meanings.sent1: He was sledgehammering the wall to make space for a new window.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker was sledgehammering the concrete to create a pathway.
meanings.sent3: The noise of sledgehammering echoed through the neighborhood, waking up everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her words sledgehammered his heart, leaving him feeling broken.
meanings.sent5: The image of him sledgehammering the door down will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: The act of using a sledgehammer to break or demolish something.
meanings.sent1: The sledgehammering of the old shed brought it down in minutes.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise of sledgehammering could be heard from the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The comedic duo attempted to perform a skit involving sledgehammering a cake.
meanings.sent4: The sledgehammering of traditions paved the way for a new era.
meanings.sent5: The forceful sledgehammering of the statue made the crowd gasp in awe.
